data.name: The Deep
data.detailed_description:
STORY

The Deep is about a marine biologist named Joel Price, who was sent to an Earth-like planet called R-Aqua because, after years of distant study, research showed that marine life was abundant and long-lasting. You play as Joel and enter an alien planet's oceans in search of the one question that has scientists scratching their heads. Why are these creatures lasting for so long? And what answers will you find 11 thousand meters in the deep?


GAMEPLAY

Go Down Down Down

You will need to descend into the deep to unlock the story elements. You will also need the right equipment to keep moving down. Just be careful of what lurks down below. With the help of your Orca (Your Little Submarine), you will be able to explore the hidden underwater world this planet hides and reach the bottom of this alien world.


Getting Tired Yet?

Why not make an underwater base and relax for a while? Construct an underwater home that will help you on your travels. You can upgrade your base as well to be able to stand the pressures of the deep. Your base will be useful for a lot of things that you wouldn't be able to do without it. These include but are not limited to.

Shelter: Nothing can get you when you are home.
Planting: You can have a space to plant some plants that will help with food amongst other things.
Crafting: Yes, you can craft without having a base, but the base offers additional crafting recipes that the (Orca) doesn't offer.




KEY FEATURES

- Base Building ( Build a base from materials gathered and make the underwater world your home! )
- Cultivating ( Grow plants to help with food and other things! )
- Inventory System ( Collect items and scavenge! )
- Upgradable Gear ( Upgrade your gear to be able to keep up with the environment )
- Underwater Exploration ( Explore a vast underwater world that goes all the way down to 11 thousand meters below the surface! )
- Crafting System ( Craft items that will help with your survival )
- Survival ( Survive on this alien planet while trying to find the answers you seek )
- Underwater Caves ( Explore and conquer underwater caves that connect to other cave systems )

data.short_description: The Deep is an underwater survival. Explore an alien underwater world and make it your home. Crafting, base-building, collecting, growing Alien plants, and upgrading equipment are but a fraction of what you'll be doing 11 thousand meters in the deep.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 +
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 500 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: No special sound card required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 +
  • Processor: Intel Core I7 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 700 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: No special sound card required
